method.question: This is a resume. return the person that this resume belongs to, usually found at the top
This is a resume. reutrn the email of the person
This is a resume. The phone of the person. Standardize this output to the format [country code]-[area code]-[phone number]

method.description: This is a resume. return the academic information listed on this resume.

properties.description: a single name of the school or university this person attended. if there are multiple schools return a line for each
return the major this person studied in undergrad. If no major is listed, return none listed
return the gpa of the person. If the resume contains more than one, return the most recent. If no gpa is listed, return none listed
return the graduation year of the person. If the resume contains more than one, return the most recent. If no year is listed, return none listed

method.description: This is a resume. a list of the companies this person has worked at, what title they held, and a description of their role.

properties.description: a job title or role that the person held at an organization. do not include the name of the organization
the date that the person started at the role
the date when the person left this role
summarize the description of each position this person has held. do not include the company name or their title. put each description on a seperate line

method.description: This is a resume. return a list of skills mentioned in the resume.

properties.description: the skills mentioned on the resume, summarized in at most three words. if there are multiple skills, return a line for each

method.description: This is a resume. return a list of non-college certifications and awards mentioned in the resume. Do not list job titles.

properties.description: the certifications or awards listed on the resume. if there are multiple skills, return a line for each
